thread.title: Corent Technology Received Outstanding Cloud / SaaS Platform Award at 22nd Annual High-Tech Innovation Awards
thread.title_full: Corent Technology Received Outstanding Cloud / SaaS Platform Award at 22nd Annual High-Tech Innovation Awards

author: admin
title: Corent Technology Received Outstanding Cloud / SaaS Platform Award at 22nd Annual High-Tech Innovation Awards
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 3:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Corent Technology 
IRVINE, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/12/15 -- SurPaaS® from Corent Technology was announced as the 2015 recipient of the Outstanding Cloud/SaaS/Web Platform award at the Tech Alliance 22nd Annual High-Tech Innovation Awards gala dinner, held on October 8 at the Westin South Coast Plaza in Costa Mesa, California. 
SurPaaS® provides rapid and intelligent migration of conventional software applications to the cloud. Whether an application was "born on the Cloud" or used SurPaaS to migrate to the Cloud, SurPaaS rapidly transforms it into a fully instrumented SaaS, on any cloud, without any programing. 
"We're pleased to recognize Corent Technology for their recognition as the Outstanding Cloud/SaaS/Web Platform at the 2015 High-Tech Innovation Awards ceremony," said Peter Craig, CEO, Orange County Technology Alliance. "With 45 finalists, every one of our award categories was extremely competitive and we congratulate all of them for their innovation. We especially congratulate Corent Technology for their selection as the outstanding Cloud/SaaS/Web Platform." 
"We are honored for such key recognition from an organization with a long track record of promoting technology innovation and the advancement and adoption of such innovative technologies," said Feyzi Fatehi, Corent CEO. 
About Corent 
Corent's SurPaaS® is a fully integrated platform to automatically Analyze, Cloudify, and SaaSify practically any software application, on any Cloud, without any programming, leading to significantly accelerated time-to market and saving millions of dollars conventionally spent on re-design and re-development of applications. Corent is managed by a team of seasoned Silicon Valley Veterans. It has established partnerships with industry leaders like Microsoft, IBM, Dell, Arrow and Accenture. 
For more information about Corent, please visit www.CorentTech.com or contact Corent at info@corenttech.com . 
About Orange County Technology Alliance Orange County Technology Alliance is a 501(c) 6 nonprofit trade association committed to fast-forwarding the local innovation economy. It is the successor organization to the Orange County Council of TechAmerica and AeA. The alliance serves members through local networking, professional development, state and federal advocacy, savings on business services and industry recognition. To learn more about membership, contact OC Tech Alliance at octech@octechalliance.com or www.octechalliance.com . Follow alliance activities on Twitter at www.twitter.com/octechalliance . Contact:
